861.name: Vital Persistence
861.description: Gain Vitality. <c=@abilitytype>Shroud</c> skills gain reduced recharge.

874.name: Strength of Undeath
874.description: Maximum life force is increased. Deal more damage when above the life-force threshold.

facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

887.name: Gluttony
887.description: Increases life force gain from skills.

888.name: Speed of Shadows
888.description: Entering shroud grants swiftness and removes movement-impairing conditions.

facts.description: Movement speed increased by 33%; stacks duration.
Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.
Movement speed decreased by 66%; skill cooldown increased by 66%; stacks duration.
Unable to move; stacks duration.

889.name: Foot in the Grave
889.description: Gain stability and break stuns when you enter shroud.

facts.description: Cannot be knocked down, pushed back, pulled, launched, stunned, dazed, floated, sunk, feared, or taunted.

891.name: Last Gasp
891.description: Gain Lesser Spectral Armor when your health falls below the threshold.

facts.text: Gain life force when taking damage.

892.name: Fear of Death
892.description: Your fear effects have increased durations. Fear nearby foes when you are downed.

facts.description: Involuntary retreat; unable to act; stacks duration.

893.name: Death Perception
893.description: Increases critical-hit chance while in shroud.

894.name: Spectral Mastery
894.description: <c=@abilitytype>Spectral</c> skills gain reduced recharge time, last longer, and grant life force on use.

898.name: Soul Marks
898.description: Marks become unblockable and generate life force when triggered.

905.name: Dhuumfire
905.description: Shroud skill 1 inflicts burning on your target.

facts.description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.

829.name: Awaken the Pain
829.description: Might grants you more power and less condition damage. Gain might when entering shroud.

facts.description: Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.

853.name: Close to Death
853.description: Increases damage to enemies below the health threshold.

899.name: Chill of Death
899.description: Cast Lesser Spinal Shivers on a foe when attacking them while their health is below the threshold.

skills.name: Lesser Spinal Shivers

facts.description: Movement speed decreased by 66%; skill cooldown increased by 66%; stacks duration.

skills.description: Chill your target and remove up to three boons, dealing extra damage based on the number of boons removed.

903.name: Spiteful Spirit
903.description: Strike around you when entering shroud.

skills.name: Spiteful Spirit

facts.description: Reflect incoming damage back to its source; stacks duration.

skills.description: Cripple nearby foes and convert their boons into conditions. Gain retaliation for each foe you strike. Converts additional boons on foes below the health threshold.

909.name: Dread
909.description: Inflicting fear on a foe applies vulnerability. Deal increased damage to foes inflicted with fear.

facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.
Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.

914.name: Spiteful Talisman
914.description: Deal increased damage to foes with no boons. Focus and axe skills recharge faster.

Deal more damage while downed. Inflict vulnerability when you strike a foe below the health threshold.
Cannot apply vulnerability the same target more than once per interval.

916.name: Spiteful Renewal

facts.description: Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.

Minions have increased health. Gain bonus toughness for each minion you control.

839.name: Soul Comprehension
839.description: Your passive life-force generation from nearby deaths is increased.

842.name: Death Nova
842.description: When you or one of your minions is downed, create a Lesser Poison Cloud. Summon a jagged horror when you kill a foe.

skills.description: Corruption. The target area is enveloped in a noxious cloud that poisons foes.

855.name: Deadly Strength
855.description: Gain power based on your toughness. Power gain doubles while in shroud.

857.name: Shrouded Removal
857.description: Lose a condition when you enter shroud and every few seconds while you remain in shroud.

858.name: Necromantic Corruption
858.description:
Minions deal more damage and take conditions from you. When a minion attacks, it transfers conditions to its target.
There is a 10 second cooldown per minion.

860.name: Reaper's Protection
860.description:
Fear nearby foes when you are disabled.
Disables include stun, daze, knockback, pull, knockdown, sink, float, fear, taunt, and launched.

1929.description: Whenever you leave shroud, you and your minions gain protection.

prefix.description:
